import React from 'react' import Background from './img/Banners/AAC-about.jpg' export default class About extends React.Component { render() { return (

Change is inevitable, progress is a choice.

Agile Advantage Consulting (AA) is a management and strategy consulting firm specialising in delivering efficient and effective professional services to assure high-performance in our clients’ organisations. Founded by Steve Biring, AA brings together the talents of international specialists in finance and management with extensive experience across sectors including higher education, property and construction, start-up technology firms, and pharmaceutical companies. AA was inspired by an opportunity to create a vehicle through which we could work together as a team and share our well-crafted knowledge and expertise gained in London and internationally with the MENA region: to create a positive, swift impact in organisations wishing to operate at a world-class level and in a sustainable fashion. We share a common philosophy of trustworthiness, cooperation, hardwork, and high emotional intelligence. We have down-to-earth personalities and a great sense of humour which allows us to take our work seriously. Each team member has at least 25 years of functional/consulting experience in their domain: both within organisations and as external consults. We don’t simply suggest solutions, we understand the frustrations of those delivering the day to day improvements and therefore take great care to minimise disruption and eliminate non-value added components whilst gaining total buy-in through connectedness. We are a high performing boutique company, specialising in SME and educational organisations. Working with our clients, we will help you find the tools you need to achieve the best.

) } }
